item.description:
http://www.meetup.com/AfricaTravel/about

 

Trip to Guinea, Africa For all those interested in learning about our Trip to Guinea in November 2011 with Mamady Kourouma, Sire Diallo Konate and more, come Friday, August 26, 2011! With slides and uplifting discussion, we will give you a lot of insight into what will happen on a trip like this. You will hear and see all of the experiences of trips past and how we do what we do! You will be impressed and we hope you will eventually join us on this trip. Perfect for educators, students, musicians and non-musicians. Refreshments will be served.

Meet at DrumConnection, 177 Mass Ave., Arlington, MA location. We start at 4PM. Plan on a 1.5 to 2 hour event! FREE Hope to see you there. In rhythm spirit, Alan Tauber, Director http://www.triptoafrica.org There will be a drum circle following the presentation.

The DrumConnection 781.648.0066 office 617.686.6080 cell
item.how_to_find_us: We'll welcome you at the door! ...and make sure you are very comfortable.

group.name: Africa Travel Group! Learn Drumming & Dance in Guinea!

item.name: Trip to Guinea! Drum, Dance and Sing this November 14, 2011!
